page.title: 20Transport Chaldon Hills
page.content:
The only means of transport is by road. There are only two minor roads within the block maintained by Dorset County Council to a standard suitable for all vehicles:- 1) B 3071 running North/South along the East side of the block linking West Lulworth to the A 352 Dorchester to Wareham road at Wool. 2) C 8 running North/South near the West side of the block linking West Lulworth to the A 352 at Winfrith Newburgh. Farmsteads off these roads are reached by unmetalled tracks. Access to the remainder of the block is by foot, horseback or off-the-road vehicles.
Compiled for Winfrith Newburgh Womens' Institute by David, Jenny, Ian and Andrew Bridges.
